title: Lords Report Slams UK Treasury for Apathy to Private Credit Risk
description: A prominent group of lawmakers from the UK’s House of Lords has criticized the Treasury for its “limited grasp” of risks related to the boom in private capital markets and said that the Bank of England needs to move faster in its plans for stress testing the sector.
content: A prominent group of lawmakers from the UK’s House of Lords has criticized the Treasury for its “limited grasp” of risks related to the boom in private capital markets and said that the Bank of England needs to move faster in its plans for stress testing the sector.
